select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, step_id, step_name, stage_name, contract_no, form_no, proofread_men, proofread_men_name, audit_men, audit_men_name, approve_men, approve_men_name, design_review_type, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, process_instance_id, is_process_end from five_ed_design_rule
